r2b.apps.base

Class BaseActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
              • r2b.apps.base.BaseActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, BaseDialog.BaseDialogListener

    public abstract class BaseActivity
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
implements BaseDialog.BaseDialogListener
    Wrapper for activity main functionality. Manage fragment back stack, preferences, main click listener, a singleton dialog fragment. Manage activity life cycle.
